Text.Page:
The devas around here are sporting some new weapons, different than the others. I figure, if it's good enough for them, it's twice as good for us.

Take out {@LinkCreature:3#300141#devan blademasters}, {@LinkCreature:3#19#brigands}, or {@LinkCreature:3#18#scrappers} and collect their armaments. If their weapons are enchanted, better we have them. Don't mess this up. The folks back home are counting on us.

Great job! This hurts the devas and helps us. I'll work on a way to get the weapons back to Crescentia or Vanguard Outpost.

Thanks for helping me out, .
Oh, they're not hard to find. Deva Silva is crawling with them. The devan women and brigands are the ones I saw with the new weapons. Try them first.
